welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ikast, Denmark! We are thrilled to have you here in our charming city known for its beautiful countryside, rich culture, and friendly people. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ikast has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Karup Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Karup Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Billund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Skive Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
